p: Biological samplings were performed by EG, JF, RS, LF-A, IS, and AI. The transcriptomic data analysis and interpretation was performed by JF, RS, EV-V, and FER-L. LF-A, IS, and AI carried out the skin mucus analyses. The study was supervised by EG, FER-L, and LT. JF wrote the original draft. Funding was obtained by EG and LT. All the authors provided critical feedback, read, and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
